title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 380-8.5 - Records of waste disposal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 380-8.5 - Records of waste disposal

State Regulations

Each person subject to this Part must maintain records of
the disposal of radioactive materials made under sections
380-3.5, 380-4.2, and
380-4.3
of this Part, including
existing records of burials in soil authorized before April
1985. *
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
380-8.5

Amended

New

York State Register April 25, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 17, eff. 5/10/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
